prompts: Create a playful elephant-like Pokemon with a blue body and red accents.
Show me a cute Pokemon inspired by a baby elephant, featuring soft colors.
Imagine a small, round Pokemon that has big ears and a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a whimsical creature that resembles an elephant, with vibrant colors and a friendly smile.
Design a Pokemon with a round body and adorable features, perfect for a forest setting.
Make a tiny blue Pokemon that loves to play in the grass and mud.
Give me a unique Pokemon that combines the charm of a baby animal with colorful features.
